verbs.description: The 40-plus questions [V: were] given to the New York Times by " a person outside Mr. Trump 's legal team , " the newspaper said .
[ARG1: The 40-plus questions] were [V: given] [ARG2: to the New York Times] [ARG0: by " a person outside Mr. Trump 's legal team] , " the newspaper said .
[ARG1: The 40-plus questions were given to the New York Times by " a person outside Mr. Trump 's legal team] , " [ARG0: the newspaper] [V: said] .
